sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Form, Table, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useApp } from '../../contexts/AppContext'; import LoadingSpinner from '../../components/common/LoadingSpinner'; const AnalyticsPage = () => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [timeRange, setTimeRange] = useState('30days'); const [analyticsData, setAnalyticsData] = useState({}); const { formatPrice } = useApp(); useEffect(() => { fetchAnalytics(); }, [timeRange]); const fetchAnalytics = async () => { try { // Mock analytics data - in real app, fetch from API const mockData = { overview: { totalRevenue: 125000, totalOrders: 89, averageOrderValue: 1404, conversionRate: 3.2 }, salesData: [ { date: '2024-01-01', revenue: 4500, orders: 3 }, { date: '2024-01-02', revenue: 5200, orders: 4 }, { date: '2024-01-03', revenue: 3800, orders: 2 }, { date: '2024-01-04', revenue: 6100, orders: 5 }, { date: '2024-01-05', revenue: 4900, orders: 3 }, { date: '2024-01-06', revenue: 7200, orders: 6 }, { date: '2024-01-07', revenue: 5500, orders: 4 }, ], topProducts: [ { name: 'Smartphone X', revenue: 25000, orders: 15, growth: 12 }, { name: 'Laptop Pro', revenue: 18000, orders: 8, growth: 8 }, { name: 'Wireless Earbuds', revenue: 12000, orders: 25, growth: 25 }, { name: 'Smart Watch', revenue: 9500, orders: 12, growth: 15 }, { name: 'Tablet Mini', revenue: 7800, orders: 7, growth: 5 }, ], customerMetrics: { newCustomers: 45, returningCustomers: 32, customerAcquisitionCost: 120, customerLifetimeValue: 840 }, paymentMethods: [ { method: 'TeleBirr', count: 45, percentage: 50.6 }, { method: 'Cash on Delivery', count: 32, percentage: 36.0 }, { method: 'Bank Transfer', count: 12, percentage: 13.4 }, ] }; setAnalyticsData(mockData); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching analytics:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const getGrowthVariant = (growth) => { if (growth > 15) return 'success'; if (growth > 5) return 'warning'; return 'danger'; }; if (loading) return ; return (

Sales Analytics

Track your business performance

setTimeRange(e.target.value)} >
{/* Overview Cards */}
Total Revenue

{formatPrice(analyticsData.overview?.totalRevenue || 0)}

12.5% from last period
Total Orders

{analyticsData.overview?.totalOrders || 0}

8.2% from last period
Avg Order Value

{formatPrice(analyticsData.overview?.averageOrderValue || 0)}

4.1% from last period
Conversion Rate

{analyticsData.overview?.conversionRate || 0}%

1.2% from last period
{/* Top Products */}
Top Performing Products
 {analyticsData.topProducts?.map((product, index) => ( ))}
Product Revenue Orders Growth
{product.name}
 {formatPrice(product.revenue)} {product.orders} {product.growth}%
{/* Customer Metrics */}
Customer Analytics

{analyticsData.customerMetrics?.newCustomers || 0}

New Customers

{analyticsData.customerMetrics?.returningCustomers || 0}

Returning Customers

{formatPrice(analyticsData.customerMetrics?.customerAcquisitionCost || 0)}

CAC

{formatPrice(analyticsData.customerMetrics?.customerLifetimeValue || 0)}

LTV
{/* Payment Methods */}
Payment Method Distribution
 {analyticsData.paymentMethods?.map((method, index) => ( ))}
Payment Method Orders Percentage
{method.method} {method.count}
{method.percentage}%
{/* Recent Sales */}
Recent Sales Activity
 {analyticsData.salesData?.map((day, index) => ( ))}
Date Revenue Orders
{new Date(day.date).toLocaleDateString()} {formatPrice(day.revenue)} {day.orders}
{/* Quick Stats Row */}

89%

Customer Satisfaction

2.1 Days

Average Delivery Time

12%

Return Rate ); }; export default AnalyticsPage;
